name: Rocket Jump [Demo]
description:
DEMO: This is a free demo of my game. This version only contains one level.
Full Version: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1747440/Rocket_Jump/

Rocket Jump is a platform game that requires concentration and composure. Your goal is to get as high as possible, avoiding spikes and various obstacles. Think carefully about your next move, any mistake can cost you a lot of nerves and time. The higher you are, the further you can fall.

Various levelsEach next level is different from the previous one. With each new level you will come across more difficult jumps and more difficult obstacles.

Physics
Make the best use of physics. Sometimes it's worth bouncing off something to get somewhere. Unfortunately, gravity will not be your friend.

Traps and obstaclesAvoid traps like fire. Death is not at hand. Why die and pass a level again?

Skins for the PlayerThere are a lot of skins available for the player in the game, you just need to find them. Everyone will find something for themselves.

Links: 
• Discord: https://discord.gg/Coresaken
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/Coresaken
• Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/RocketJump 
• YouTube:  https://www.youtube.com/Coresaken
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CoresakenGames
• Website: https://coresaken.com/

Features of the game:
• Challenging gameplay
• Nice pixel graphics
• Amazing player physics
• Various obstacles
• Challenging jumps
• A game for every age group
• Game saving system
• Personalization of the player's appearance
• Unlimited time to pass the level, no stress
